ModMetaData.name: Sand Castles
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Colonists can build sandcastles when it's warm out, as a recreation activity.
Textures by Johny Commander.
Idea from [url=ttps://www.reddit.com/r/RimWorld/comments/eu7nwy/suggestion_for_a_mod_or_the_actual_game/]this reddit thread by sossololpipi[/url]
